question: How much experience do you have of any part of Project Binder (including mybinder.org and repo2docker)?
choices: I know about Project Binder and I use it regularly

question: Why do you prioritise reproducibility?

Archive work on a longer timescale (e.g., 3, 5, 10 years)

question: If you publish code: How do you publish it? When on your research timeline do you publish it?
